Posts.Content: Feb 3, 2010 08:41AM karendunn36 wrote: i went to my docs on monday 4th jan i was refered to clinic on the friday8th where i had 4 hrs of tests done, i went back following friday for resukts which were possitive they then did test under my arm for nodes and booked me in for op on 26th jan but when i went for results of nodes on 22nd jan i was told because the lump was so small 11mm i had to have a wire put in to pinpoint the location to be accurate so i had to go to a different hospital the following week, just had op on monday 4th feb now waiting for results n 12th so all in all pretty quick even though i didnt think so at the time xxx
Posts.Title: Reasonable Waiting Time dana14 karendunn36
